title: How to Convert JFIF to JPG

steps.title: Go to https://convertio.co/jfif-jpg/.
steps.content: Go to https://convertio.co/jfif-jpg/ . Use any browser on your computer, phone, or tablet. This is one of many websites you can use to convert images. Some others to try are: https://www.onlineconverter.com/jfif-to-jpg https://anyconv.com/jfif-to-jpg-converter/ .

steps.title: Click Choose Files.
steps.content: Click Choose Files . This is in the red bar in the dark gray window, and is depicted with a folder icon and a magnifying glass. This option allows you to choose a file from your computer, phone, or tablet. To select a file saved from another location, choose one of the other options to the right of Choose Files . Tap the box icon to load a file from Dropbox, or tap the triangle icon to load a file from Google Drive. Tap the link on the far right to put in a link from a website.

steps.title: Select the .jfif file.
steps.content: Select the .jfif file. Double-click or tap on the file to select it. You can also select the file then click Open .

steps.title: Click Convert.
steps.content: Click Convert . This is a red button with an arrow. The file will start converting. An orange status bar will display the conversion progress.

steps.title: Click Download.
steps.content: Click Download . This is a blue button that will appear once the file is done converting. The file will download in the background. Click on it to open or save it to your device.

steps.title: Open Google Chrome on your computer.
steps.content: Open Google Chrome on your computer. The icon is a multicolor ball with a blue center.

steps.title: Open the Chrome Web Store.
steps.content: Open the Chrome Web Store. Go to https://chrome.google.com/webstore/ .

steps.title: Search "change JFIF to JPG".
steps.content: Search "change JFIF to JPG". Click into the search bar in the top left and type in the query, then hit â†µ Enter .

steps.title: Click Add to Chrome next to the result.
steps.content: Click Add to Chrome next to the result. It should be called something like "Change JPEG/JFIF to JPG". The extension will be automatically added to your browser.

steps.title: Download the .jfif file.
steps.content: Download the .jfif file. If the image is embedded, right-click and select Save file as . This extension works without you needing to click on anything. Whenever you download a .jfif file using Chrome with the extension enabled, it will automatically convert to a .jpg before the download file appears in your browser at the bottom.
